whatsNewHTML:
What's New

The Yr app finally supports widgets, and you can choose between 2 versions: Small (4 x 1) containing forecast only, or big (4 x 2) containing forecast and a clock.
When you have added the widget to your start screen, you will get the forecast for the next 24 hours (6 hours interval) for your favourite location (as chosen in the Yr app). You can open the app by pressing the widget, and the transparency of the widget can be adjusted in the app's settings.
description: Contains weather forecasts, textual forecasts, meteograms and extreme weather warnings.Tip: To see the meteogram, turn your phone to landscape mode when you are viewing a spesific place.Yr.no is a service from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and NRK.
descriptionHTML:
Contains weather forecasts, textual forecasts, meteograms and extreme weather warnings.

Tip: To see the meteogram, turn your phone to landscape mode when you are viewing a spesific place.

Yr.no is a service from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute and NRK.
whatsNew: The Yr app finally supports widgets, and you can choose between 2 versions: Small (4 x 1) containing forecast only, or big (4 x 2) containing forecast and a clock.When you have added the widget to your start screen, you will get the forecast for the next 24 hours (6 hours interval) for your favourite location (as chosen in the Yr app). You can open the app by pressing the widget, and the transparency of the widget can be adjusted in the app's settings.

topReviews.reviewText: Once you switch off the network, app will forgot forecast and shows only blank screen... i also do not like that it does not allow me to add location manually (have tried) without constantly locate me with GPS and WiFi. Yet YR has reputation of best weather forecast.
Worked perfectly. After the latest update the app struggles with GPS problems
Glad to see the widgets! Take a look at the aix weather widget and combine it with your clock...and I will find a way to give you 6 out of 5 stars.
"The weather were you are" ... so poetic... 4 stars though, because you guess in 80% of the cases. Spel chec you titl pleas.
I am so glad there are finally widgets. But my favorite part of the app is the weather graph when you turn the phone in landscape. It would be perfect if we could use that graph as a widget.
No access to gps stalls the app... Until the problem is addressed I will give max 1 star
topReviews.reviewTitle: Not working on note4 after update

topReviews.reviewText: Do not wanna show weather in my district, shows Oslo as fav city,but not mine. Refresh button doesn't work
Would be great to have the option to display the week number and the meteogram in the widget.
You have to enter your location manually.
Fin ny widget. Bare kjedelig at man ikke kommer til systemklokken ved å trykke på klokken. Håper på fix i neste update :)

A pity! When launching the app in forced Landscape mode  (frequently for Tablets); (16:9; 800x480) and Nova Launcher it stay in  forced Portrait mode! And obviously there is no full functionality! So the web cameras and other graphics together with settings are not available!   -- P.S.-- Otherwise it is very accurate and in the 7" tablets very rich in functionality app! Widget is extra good with 3 hour forecast. Please make something with detection of display orientation and resolution!  Drasko from Croatia.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Still not working in Landscape mode for 9" (16X9) Tablet!

topReviews.reviewText: Love the app. I wish you could add a setting to change wind speed to km/h
It's all about the content, they have got it right, so much better than the met office.
Search doesn't work anymore.
Uninstalling.
topReviews.reviewTitle: Now use the admob Adware library

topReviews.reviewText: Several apps released the last few days utilizing the full potential of Android design principles. The feature that gives you a meteogram when you flip the device is very neat and a little innovation in itself.
topReviews.reviewTitle: It seems NRK finally have learned

topReviews.reviewText: After using for almost 4 months now when I want to see forecast for day and I click the current forecast it says that location is not discover and wait for GPS.  My GPS is on and for current weather app shows current location.  Using Samsung S5. Restart of phone and also reload of app doesn't solve it.
But need 5x2 and 5x1 for larger screens...
Nice weather app, bit different to most. Wigdets option doesn't on my phone, and only get the 4x2 option on my tablet....
Great app. Simple. Weather forecasts when you need them.
But needs 5x2 and 5x1 widgets as well...
Find this the most accurate of all the forecast apps I have. Excellent.
No idea or instructions as to how I can install the widget on my phone,  accurate forecasts though
No widgets found in my Nexus 6!
No widgets on Nexus 5 with Android 5.1.
Widget shows error message instead of time when no internet connection. Please fix it!
Most accurate weather app... Love the new Widgets. :)
Please fix...
topReviews.reviewTitle: Can't add a new city after the last upgrade

topReviews.reviewText: Trenger time for time i appen også.
No local forecast (no GPS) after update. Please fix it
Thanks for developing a widget! However, data refreshing problem has started after you have released the widget. Please update it. Yr.no itself is much more accurate than any other weather app.
If the location option is enabled, the widget seem to consume extreme amount of battery
topReviews.reviewTitle: Widgets consume lot of battery if location is enabled

topReviews.reviewText: To get 5 stars make it so that when I press the time I get directed to the clock app. When I press date calender opens. This is the only thing we need. YR is almost perfect!!

Great app for checking the weather. It updates nicely both the weather and my location.  I would give it 5 stars if I could show the detailed meteogram in a resizable widget and if there was a button to access it in the app (instead of having to deactivate rotation lock in order to view it).
Two things missing on the widget. Current temperature and there should be an option to directly access meteo graph for current location by clicking on the widget. Still the app is great!

I'm using this app for a long time because of high forecast accuracy but since the recent upgrade the app is practically unusable without GPS. Please fix this or else I will need to find a new weather app.
This trustworthy weather app is great. Missing a 5 x 2 widget, though...
Top class weather app
.. Widget fails to update.
Very accurate
